member.name: SOCKADDR_IN6_PAIR
member.summary: The SOCKADDR_IN6_PAIR structure contains pointers to a pair of IP addresses that represent a source and destination address pair.

member.name: SOCKADDR_IN6_PAIR.SourceAddress
member.summary: A pointer to an IP source address represented as a SOCKADDR_IN6 structure. The address family is in host byte order and the IPv6 address, port, flow information, and zone ID are in network byte order.

member.name: SOCKADDR_IN6_PAIR.DestinationAddress
member.summary: A pointer to an IP source address represented as a SOCKADDR_IN6 structure. The address family is in host byte order and the IPv6 address, port, flow information, and zone ID are in network byte order.
